fields.text: Has the organization established a business continuity management framework?
fields.description: This question assesses whether the organization has formally established a BCM framework
fields.guidance_notes: Look for documented BCM policies, procedures, and organizational structure

fields.text: Are BCM roles and responsibilities clearly defined and documented?
fields.description: This question evaluates the clarity of BCM roles and responsibilities
fields.guidance_notes: Check for RACI matrices, job descriptions, and organizational charts

fields.text: Is there organizational awareness and understanding of business continuity principles?
fields.description: This question assesses the level of BCM awareness across the organization
fields.guidance_notes: Look for training programs, communication campaigns, and awareness metrics

fields.text: Has the organization conducted a comprehensive business impact analysis?
fields.description: This question assesses the completeness of business impact analysis
fields.guidance_notes: Check for BIA methodology, critical business functions identification, and impact assessments
